title: A Gamer's Diet.
body:
So to a lot of adult gamers pretty much anything edible can become a meal, sometimes we aren't very healthy and sometimes we throw stuff together a "normal" person would recoil in disgust at.

I myself am quite healthy with what I eat, always trying to a good balance of nutritious foods, but I get these interesting cravings.
Take right now for example, I just had a breakfast that consisted of curry tuna on toast with pickles and cheese. Was really tasty. {{champion:96}}  Would approve!

So what sort of unusual food combos does the rest of the OCE crowd come out with?
Rioters we all know long work nights can have you come home sometimes to just throwing food in a bowl and calling it a meal.

replies.body: Tomato sauce, cheese and best foods mayo in a toasted sandwich :D My go to food after a long day rock climbing or after a day being lazy and playing League.

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dYBewBNE,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2014-12-13T07:46:03.143+0000)
> Tomato sauce, cheese and best foods mayo in a toasted sandwich :D My go to food after a long day rock climbing or after a day being lazy and playing League.

I just vomited in my mouth a little.
reading this thread i am gagging and about to vomit
I put milo on my weetbix sometimes.
Biscuts and Cheese........................................ with BBQ or Tomato Sauce.

lol, cooks a feast of varying vegetables and its boring as %%%%.
#WhyDidIGoVegetarian?

Pastrami/Salmon and PhilliSpread on Bagels
Melted Cheese Toasties with Tomato Sauce underneath, like a poor mans pizza.
Green Tea thats been brewed for over 30 mins. I like it Bitter and not scolding.
SunRice 90Sec Pad Thai Dish is amazing dgaf if its prepackaged, that shiz is to die for.
Jatz with Oysters.

QUICKSCOPEBREAKFULMOUNTAINDEWRITONACHODRYNBOMBSUPPLESPLODE SUBSTITUTE MEAL.

[NSFW kinda]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Ok7ga5bLU0
So the general consensus is Tomato Sauce OP?

Lucky/somewhat-unlucky for me, my mom is the biggest health addict you will ever meet. She won’t let any unhealthy good down my throat.
Unlucky for me, I can’t eat whatever I want, but-
Lucky for me, she cooks health food really well so-

Both make up for each other.

(she’s so much of a health addict, once I forgot to flush the toilet, she looks at my piss, turns to me and says blankly “you need to eat more protein”, and I’m just like “wahtehell”)
